name: Red Berry, Cabbage and Almond Smoothie
description: Another high-anthocyanin red smoothie, this one also delivers the benefits of red cabbage, a cruciferous vegetable high in antioxidant-rich sulfur compounds, and almonds, a very good source of manganese and vitamin E.
keywords: berries, cabbage, orange juice, dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, high fiber, low cholesterol, low-sodium, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mixed frozen berries, preferably with some cherries included in the mix
6 almonds or 2 teaspoons raw almond butter

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend for 1 full minute. Pour into a glass, garnish with an orange slice and enjoy.
